description: ★ Jot Extension for Desktop and Mobile Firefox saves information about the current web page and any active text selection. ★ These time-stamped entries can be downloaded as JSON or in user-defined file formats, preset to timeclock and csv format. ★ Syncing of Jot data works for Linux, OS X, Windows between browsers connected to the same Firefox Account. ★ Various types of text selections (possibly multiple in Desktop browsers) properly preserve embedded newlines, e.g. MDN code samples
